Articles.Content:
Floor 581: Skaia (homestuck).

(Aww yeah 501st page)
Floor 582, home of the 13th page for those of us who have customised our viewing options.
Floor 583: A lecture on partial differential equations.
Floor 584: A bar to allow one to recover from the floor below
floor 585: a room bigger on the inside with a locked police box you swear you hear it humming
Floor 586: Main engine room
Floor 587: The room with no sound, since I have a sore throat and can't speak
floor 588: floor with to much sound...
Floor 589: Train Station
Floor 590: there's an island ,and you hear a narrator say:"Welcome to the island of Sodor.."
Floor 591: A candybar factory.
Floor 592: Tooth Decay Accelerator.
Floor 593: A dentist's surgery.
Floor 594: You see a factory assembling Kerbals, you go up a level....
Floor 595: A kerbal being killed
Floor 596: You see an explosion and a kerbal dramatically walking away from it... You go up a level

597 You see Whener Von Kerman killing himself because Jebediah blew up all his rockets.

Edited November 14, 2013 by TADBTD
598 You find the Apeture Science Handheld Portal Device and use to get to the next floor. Keep in mind next person that posts can use it now too.
599 due to some kind of paradox you turn into a pony when you walk out of the portal...

floor 600- you find a malfunctioning inprobility drive was the cause of paradox on floor 599 and fix it but while doing so you turn in to a dog, a cat, and finaly a stringy version of yourself

Edited November 14, 2013 by toolofdarkness
602 You find debris from 0.8 parts and GLaDOS's chamber. You also find debris on the stairwell from floor 999999999999999999999. You need to use the ASHPD.
floor 603- you see a old man in a corner shaking and saying watch out for floor 604
Floor 604 - You see a horror like no other, making you run towards the Staircase
605-you see the fandom equestria...and run away
606-you see a great crescendo of EXPLOSIONS
